item.title: Mental State classification (Part 1)
item.description: Oscillatory: Testing recent and promising machine learning algorithms to classify cognitive and affective states from oscillatory-based EEG signals

item.title: Curiosity
item.description: Towards measuring states of epistemic curiosity through EEG and physiological signals

item.title: Mental State classification (Part 2)
item.description: Evoked Response Potential: Testing recent and promising machine learning algorithms to classify cognitive states and curiosity levels from ERP-based EEG signals

item.title: BioPyC
item.description: A python platform for offline EEG and bio signals classification

item.title: Cognitive Workload & MI-BCI
item.description: Towards understanding the effect of user’s cognitive state on BCI performance
